name: Cave Runner - Demo
description:
Controls Keyboard:

Arrow left = run left, arrow right = run right, arrow up = jump, space = attack/accept

Xbox controller:

Control stick = run left and right, A = jump/accept, X = attack

  • My first game – a small platformer in development.
  • Game made with Godot.
  • Art made with Aseprite.
  • Use downloadable files for a better experience.
  • Visit my youtube channel for updates: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEkbHXEYP5-oSrHpRGa1SZQ

Feel free to test and leave a comment :)
